definitions.definition: A fully sufficient or abundant quantity of; enough or more than enough.
examples: We have ample time to finish the task.
It is a large house with ample space for all of us.

definitions.definition: A quantity (of something) that is fully sufficient; plenty .
examples: We don't need any more. We already have ample .

main_definition: A fully sufficient or abundant quantity of; enough or more than enough.
secondary_definitions: ( as pronoun ) A quantity (of something) that is fully sufficient; plenty .
